item.title: Width restrictor post ‘Missing’ yet again….., 23rd December
item.description:
…and, unlike last week, nowhere to be seen….. This is a perennial problem Bromley Council and MUST be addressed: serious accidents have occurred at this location in past years and now vehicles are regularly driving at speed on the wrong side of the road….. Please address as a matter of URGENCY….. Photos attached as at at 06:30 Tuesday 23 December…..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Watts Lane, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black rubbish bags dumped on pavement, 23rd December
item.description:

item.title: In front of the along The Granville Plus Nursery, NW6, 23rd December
item.description:
Along the Granville Plus Nursery, Granville Road NW6. The Red Brick Building Refurbished. Has been reported and The Litter REMAINS. Makes the Road look SCRUFFY. And it’s Near the Nursery . Also on front of the Building Site There is Litter NEEDS Sweeping. If the job is done PROPERLY This would NOT have to be Complained about AGAIN.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cambridge Road, London
